meanings.definition: The position or role of a legislator.
meanings.sent1: In our country, many people aspire to hold important legislatives roles.
meanings.sent2: The legislatorships in the parliament work together to create new laws.
meanings.sent3: The legislatorships at the state level sometimes have to debate for hours on end.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her legislatorship was like a guiding light for the community.
meanings.sent5: The responsibilities of the legislatorships include representing the people's interests.

meanings.definition: The collective body of legislators in a particular government.
meanings.sent1: The legislatorships gathered to discuss the upcoming budget allocations.
meanings.sent2: During the session, the legislatorships debated fiercely on the proposed bill.
meanings.sent3: The legislatorships decided to have a potluck to celebrate the end of the legislative session.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the legislatorships was crucial in passing the new law.
meanings.sent5: The diversity within the legislatorships brought different perspectives to the table.
